metadata.synopsis: If players want to enter to the Elfsong Tavern Camp using the door, they will say this AD about talking with the inkeeper and rent the place.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Make click on S_LOW_Elfsong_DoorToCamp_d6c943ae-ac6a-4f3b-9805-1f11a6d32b18 before the following flag is set: CAMP_Elfsong_PaymentDone_fd063151-f443-4b87-80bf-6a9441b2b4d7

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I wonder if any of these rooms are available to rent?
